name: DefaultCube'sEscape
description:
Play as the default blender cube trying to escape the recycling bin. 

I made this game as a personal 24hr game jam. I think it turned out pretty well, its sort of like a super monkey ball type game.

The game is meant to be played in windowed mode.

@AmberSky256 on twitter

Credit to ableskittles on YT for the music
